node.title: Investigation underway into West Coast helicopter crash
node.description: Air Accident investigators are travelling to the West Coast today, to find out why a helicopter crashed.
node.content:
["Air Accident investigators are travelling to the West Coast today, to find out why a helicopter crashed.", "", "
The Karamea River Photo: Graeme Coop
", "The chopper came down at Karamea yesterday afternoon, seriously injuring the pilot.", "The crash scene is now a restricted site and two investigators from the Air Transport Accident Investigation Commission will gather evidence and secure wreckage and electronic records.", "Chief Investigator of Accidents Harald Hendel said locals and holidaymakers who saw the helicopter in-flight or who witnessed the crash were asked to contact the commission.", "He said investigators are particularly interested in receiving photos or videos."]
